summary: Comprehensive testing of Healthcare AI Platform completed successfully. All backend APIs (26/26) and frontend features working correctly. Key AI feature with provenance links fully functional.
passed_tests: Role selection page loads with all three roles (Student, Doctor, Pharmacist)
Student Portal: Health stats dashboard displays age, sex, blood group, prescription count
Student Portal: Prescription list shows symptoms, medications, prescriber info
Student Portal: Appointment booking dialog opens and functions correctly
Doctor Portal: Appointment queue displays scheduled appointments
Doctor Portal: AI Summary button opens AI-generated clinical summaries
Doctor Portal: Provenance links are clickable and show original clinical sources
Doctor Portal: 'Original Clinical Source' dialog displays prescription data correctly
Doctor Portal: Write Prescription dialog opens and functions
Pharmacist Portal: Shows pending prescription requests (10 items)
Pharmacist Portal: Low stock alert displays items below minimum level (2 items)
Pharmacist Portal: Inventory Management tab shows all medicines with restock actions
All backend API endpoints return correct status codes and data
AI summaries contain provenance links that trace back to original prescriptions
Navigation between all three portals works seamlessly
Authentication system works for role-based access

success_percentage.ai_features: 100% (AI summaries with provenance links fully operational)
